<h1 align="center">
  Redstitch Gatsby Boilerplate
</h1>

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Install Gatsby CLI**

    ```sh
    npm i --global gatsby-cli
    ```
2. **Clone the boilerplate and create a new GatsbyJS Application**

    ```
    gatsby new PROJECT-NAME https://github.com/Redstitch/gatsby-boiler
    ```

3.  **Start developing**

    Navigate into your new siteâ€™s directory and start it up.

    ```sh
    cd PROJECT-NAME
    npm start
    ```

4. **Using the components**

    This is just a code example of each of the high-level components. Navigate to `src/components/organisms` to see their children and props.

    ```sh
    <Gallery />
    <Team />
    <Quote />
    <FeatureImage />
    <FeatureLarge />
    <FeaturesSmall />
    <CallToAction />
    <Heading />
    ```
